title: Understanding Bold Style
text: To apply bold style to a cell, you need to use a specific button in the toolbar.

title: Locating the Bold Button
text: The bold button is usually represented by a 'B' icon in the toolbar.

hintAnswer: Click on the cell, then click the bold button
title: Steps to Apply Bold Style
text: What are the steps to apply bold style to a cell?
choices: Click on the cell, then click the bold button
Click on the cell, then type 'bold'
